Table 5#8#5A# Gross Government Fixed Inv: [Billions of dollars]
Annual data from 1969 To 1997
Bureau of Economic Analysis
Data published August 20, 2009
File created 10/26/2011 8:22:22 AM
NA
Line
NA
NA
1. Consists of general government and government enterprise expenditures for fixed assets.
2. Structures and software include compensation of government employees engaged in new
own-account investment and related expenditures for goods and services.
3. Consists of Department of Defense new structures, except family housing.
4. Excludes educational structures associated with hospitals, nondefense industrial, other
buildings, conservation and development, and other nondefense structures, which are included
in those categories.
5. Consists primarily of general office buildings, police and fire stations, courthouses,
auditoriums, garages, and passenger terminals.
6. Excludes highways and streets associated with hospitals, other buildings, and other
nondefense structures, which are included in those categories.
7. Consists primarily of electric and gas facilities, transit systems, and airfields.
8. Excludes the value of construction for educational facilities built at hospital sites.
9. Excludes highways and streets associated with other nonbuilding structures, which are
included in that category.
